== Date, Time and Place ==
The next meeting will take place on '''Thursday, February 28th 2008 at 6:30pm (PST)''' at ''7401 SW Washo Ct, Suite 200, Tualatin, OR 97062''.

A projector and adequate seating is available however, internet might not be available (stay tuned for confirmation).  Please RSVP if you plan on attending so we can provide refreshments.

Team meetings are open to anyone interested in current team activities.  All team members are encouraged to attend.  If you would like to discuss something that is not shown on the agenda, by all means feel free to add it here so it will be covered.

For more information regarding the meeting, please contact the team via the mailing list ''(ubuntu-us-or@lists.ubuntu.com)'' or at '''''#ubuntu-us-or''''', ''irc.freenode.net''.
